name: Moons of Ardan
description:
Moons of Ardan is a city-building and management game where you rebuild and expand your civilization across moons in a real-time simulated planetary system.

You follow the Axonauts, the survivors of a generational ship that crashed on a lonely moon.
In the crash, most of the technology that served them got lost.

Help them restore their culture and reconnect with their homeworld by building a great wonder.



  • Collect basic materials to build towns to provide shelter to your people.
  • Collect resources and transform them to fulfil the people’s basic needs but also their most luxurious whims.



  • Balance the use of workers to create a powerful and efficient economy.
  • Carefully lay an effective transporter network.



  • Develop new technologies to uncover the space travel secret.
  • Expand your empire in a real-time simulated planetary system.



  • Create new colonies to exploit discovered materials desired by your high-level citizens.
  • Create efficient trade routes to send resources to the most needed location.



Push your people to build that awesome building and become the new master of space.



  • Real-time planetary system with 3 different handcrafted moons.
  • Great planetary views.
  • 3 tiers of population progression.
  • 25+ resources to collect and manage.
  • Challenging production chains
  • Gridless and organic city building.
  • A space route system for resources to reach your stranded.
  • A factory slot system to fine-tune your building outputs.
  • Play at your own speed or even pause the game to plan your empire.
  • Awesome tailor-made soundtrack.
  • A basic tutorial system for players not used to this kind of game.



  • Photo mode.
  • Challenging achievement system.
  • Meaningful sustainability choices that make the game harder but with a more satisfying output.
  • Procedural planetary systems.
  • Animated build visuals.
